mapper.insert: insert into nearby_agency ( agency_name, sys_user_name, sys_user_password, mobilePhone, email, open_id, is_cooperation, city, location, address, create_time, update_time, is_del ) values ( #{agencyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysUserPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isCooperation,jdbcType=Integer}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(), 0 )
